details.Description: Updates on COVID-19 research, detection methods, and testing protocols.
details.Event Details: The Bharat Institute of Science and Technology (BARC) has announced the results of its COVID-19 research. The results include updates on detection methods, testing protocols, and other relevant information. The BARC is also recruiting for various positions related to COVID-19 research and testing. More details can be found on their website.
details.Upcoming Events: The next update will be announced on March 15, 2025.

name: Defence Institute of Chemical Research (DICR) Fellowship Program

details.Eligibility criteria and application pro: Please visit the official website for more information.
details.Selection process and timeline: Merit-based selection, with selection interviews to be held in May-June 2025.

details.Eligibility Criteria: Candidates with M.E/M.Tech/Equivalent Degree in Mechanical, Chemical, Metallurgical / Materials, Electrical, Electronics, Computer, Instrumentation & Civil Engineering.
details.Selection Process: Screening to Maier: FA 2025 Selection Examination (CBT) Interviews June 2025
